snippet.title: Warhammer: Chaosbane – Dwarf Engineer Gameplay [ESRB]
snippet.description:
Play a new character for free in Warhammer: Chaosbane! Keela the Dwarf Engineer is now available, alongside a set of missions set in the forges of Nuln's Gunnery School. 

Crusade across the Fantasy Battles universe with up to four friends in local and online co-op. Warhammer: Chaosbane is available on PC, PS4 and Xbox One.
-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGames
Twitter ►https://twitter.com/Nacon
